title: The means of access shall be normally governed by the provisions of Regulation No
clause_text: The means of access shall be normally governed by the provisions of Regulation No. 23. However, in the URS, wherever the design of the buildings up to 32 m. height requires relaxation in the width of access, the same may be given. However, high rise building shall be permissible only on access having width of 9 m. and above.
section: Relaxation in Building and other requirements:-
